alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:46PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of northwestern Salt Lake and southeastern Davis Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 745 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow winds over Salt Lake City International Airport, or near Salt Lake City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Murray, Bountiful, Farmington, Taylorsville, Kaysville, South Salt Lake, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful, Kearns, Salt Lake City International Airport, Magna, Millcreek, Fruit Heights, University Of Utah and Sugarhouse. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 303 and 326. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 103 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
